name: Write an email to your friend inviting them to your birthday party. Include details about the time, location, and activities planned.
questionContents: Write an email to your friend inviting them to your birthday party. Include details about the time, location, and activities planned. Write 25 to 35 words.

name: Write an email to your teacher asking for advice about how to improve your English. Include details about your current challenges and what areas you would like to focus on.
